nodes.text: Feriae Junction, also known as Junction, was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories, situated along the Hydian Way hyperspace route, which connected it to Toprawa and Celanon. During the Imperial Era, in retaliation for an attack on a TaggeCo supply ship, Lady Domina Tagge gave orders for a battleship to cut the D'Armin Syndicate off at Feriae Junction and take their engines and weapons out, before pushing them into the sun after one day.
